value.name: Grandmother Arrested After 4-Year-Old Girl Was Allegedly Killed by Mother
value.description: Tammy Taylor Moffett, 53, was arrested by police after her daughter, Malikah Diane Bennett, 31, was charged three days earlier with killing her 4-year-old.

value.name: 2nd woman charged in death of toddler killed, buried behind home: Charlotte police
value.description: Three days after a Charlotte woman was charged with murdering her own 4-year-old daughter, another woman is now accused of concealing the child's death. WCNC Charlotte previously reported that Charlotte Mecklenburg police had charged Malikah Diane Bennett with multiple charges after investigators found the body of her daughter,

video.name: Another woman charged in hiding death of 4-year-old girl, Charlotte police say

value.name: Charlotte mother charged in death of 4-year-old girl who had been missing for months
value.description: The mother of a 4-year-old Charlotte girl who has not been seen in several months was charged with murder Friday.

video.name: Charlotte mother charged in death of 4-year-old girl who had been missing for months

value.name: 'Deeply disturbing' | Mother charged with murder of 4-year-old daughter
value.description: A Charlotte mother charged with the murder of her 4-year-old daughter made her first appearance in court Monday. Malikah Diane Bennett is facing multiple charges, including first-degree murder, after investigators found the body of her daughter,

video.name: CMPD UPDATE: Mom charged with murder of 4-year-old

value.name: The bears are using a pathway between our neighbors house and...
value.description: The bears are using a pathway between our neighbors house and ours to cross Riverside Rd. on a fairly consistent basis - there's one pretty big one and a few smaller ones -- probably last year or two's yearlings.

value.name: Mother charged in 4-year-old's death after remains were found in northwest Charlotte
value.description: A Charlotte mother was charged after police found the body of a missing 4-year-old girl. According to Charlotte-Mecklenburg Police, detectives received a report that the girl hadn't been seen in several months.
